mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, IS_ADMIN, PERSONAL_CODE) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{is_admin}, #{personal_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, IS_ADMIN = #{is_admin}, PERSONAL_CODE = #{personal_code} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
